column4: hello gud morning to all, i installed ubuntu 10.10 in my pc with  windows 7.. shall i install ubuntu studio in to my pc... will it effect  anyway to ubuntu 10.10?

ubuntu studio is a completely different version of ubuntu... it is not supported here.
